entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing rain. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening then partly cloudy. Risk of freezing rain this evening. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 14 January 2023
